title: Prodex Configuration Schema (v2.1)
description: Defines runtime behavior for the Prodex dependency extractor.

$schema.description: Link to the Prodex schema for IDE validation.

outDir.description: Output directory where the combined file will be written.

scanDepth.description: How deep to scan when listing entry files in the interactive picker.

limit.description: Maximum number of files to include in the dependency chain before stopping (0 disables limit).

resolverDepth.description: Maximum recursion depth for JS/PHP dependency resolution (prevents infinite circular imports).

entry.description: Settings for entry discovery (which source files to start flattening from).

includes.description: Directories or glob patterns to scan for entry files (e.g. app, routes, resources/js).

excludes.description: Glob patterns to exclude (supports both directories and files).

priority.description: Glob patterns determining the order entries appear in the selection list.

imports.description: Settings controlling how imports are resolved during dependency traversal.

includes.description: Glob patterns for additional files to always include (e.g. .d.ts, interfaces).

excludes.description: Glob patterns to exclude from dependency resolution (e.g. node_modules/**, @shadcn/**).

aliases.description: Alias path mappings used for import resolution (Vite/TSConfig style).
